invocations.description: Will increase the amount of money you spent during your hunt by amount. This function can be used if you want to keep track exactly of how much money you used, so you could use it for travel actions, for example.
invocations.ex:
say('hi') wait(1500, 2500)
npcsay('venore') wait(300, 700)
npcsay('yes') wait(300, 700)
increasemoneyspent(130)
invocations.exDescription: Will increase the amount of money you spent by 130 GPs, after you traveled from 'Carlin' to 'Venore'
